review:
Dr Kriti Arora is a thorough professional whose acumen as a dentist far supersedes her contemporaries.. The stand out attribute of the Lady is the sheer concern for a patient's welfare and comfort.. Seldom will you encounter such a Doctor with such high levels of professional acumen and ethical standards..
The manner in which Clean and Correct Dentistry has been functioning also merits a mention.. In the Era of Pandemic the way cleanliness and sanitization is carried out is extremely heartening.. 
Overall, with great sense of conviction I can say that this is the best clinic that I have been treated for my tooth problems in the past 25 years of visitations in various clinics within India and Abroad...
